Event.name: Name_conferral
Event.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains words that talk about how Speakers name Entities.
<ex>They drove through <fex name="Entity">an area</fex> <t>nicknamed</t> <fex name="Name">Sniper's Alley</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Speaker">His parents</fex> <t>named</t> <fex name="Entity">him</fex> <fex name="Name">Winston</fex> <fex name="Name_source">after the British prime minister</fex>.</ex>
In this frame we will ignore uses of words like baptize and christen that don't clearly bring out the name conferral but talk about the meaning of baptism etc. as a sacrament:
<ex>They christened the child on December 4th.</ex> <ex>Method was baptized into the church soon thereafter.</ex> <ex>Cyril was baptized as a Methodist.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Entity
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity that Speakers refer to by using the Name.</def-root>

Arg.name: Name
Arg.definition: <def-root>The linguistic expression by which Speakers refer to the Entity.</def-root>

Arg.name: Speaker
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who uses the linguistic expression (Name) to refer to the Referent.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The instrument with which an intentional act is performed.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Explanation of the intentional act. We <t>did</t> it <fex name="Motive">for the hell of it</fex>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which an intentional act is performed. John <t>flattered</t> her <fex name="Purpose">to receive a raise</fex>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Name_source
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This frame element is the person or thing whose name was chosen by the Speaker to give to the Entity.
They <t>named</t> their daughter Carol <fex name="Name_source">after Paul's grandmother</fex>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An action the <fen>Speaker</fen> takes in order to accomplish the name conferral.
<ex>When he was born they <t>christened</t> him <fex name="Means">by smashing a bottle of champagne against his arse</fex></ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: dub.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: give an unofficial name or nickname to

lexUnit.name: christen.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to give a baby a Christian name

lexUnit.name: baptize.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: give a specified name or nickname to.

lexUnit.name: rename.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to give a new name to something

lexUnit.name: call.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to give a name to something
